name: War of Reproduction 3
description:
Inevitable conflict, war and strife for existence!

We invite you to the ruthless race to become the champion among 300 million competitors.

* Game Features

1) Simple controls using only touch & drag

2) Strategic gaming via various regional conditions and unique, powerful units

3) Evolve to legendary stage with the tribute system, unhindered by premium purchase

4) Highly addictive immersion due to sophisticated design of strategy, balancing and difficulty curve

5) Enhanced user-to-user interactions
